name: Dance Dance Girl
detailed_description:
Hi!Thank you for your attention!

I’m the leader of this all-girl pop group.Nice to meet you!

We are smart and beautiful,but we are a new group here, we are not mature enough,please help us!Come and training together!
Let’s dance together!collect yellow stars and get rewards!

This game has beautiful graphics and models,playing this game will let you relax,7 beautiful girls will play with you,click the yellow stars then you will get rewards!
Let’s dance!

Game feature：
-Beautiful graphics and models.
-Good music.
-This is a game that combines casual elements and visual novel elements.
-There are 3 different item in game,each item has its own function.
-There are 8 female characters, all characters are 3D model and fully animated.
-There are 1 “Mystery” stage.

short_description: This game has beautiful graphics and girls,they can dance for you!Come and play together!
supported_languages: English, German, Ukrainian, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or Later
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content
